Package skywaysolutions.app.database

Class DatabaseBackupTable

java.lang.Object
skywaysolutions.app.database.DatabaseBackupTable
public final class DatabaseBackupTable extends Object
This class represents a backup of a database table. This also provides a static way of streaming the backup to/from a file to/from the database.
Author:
Alfred Manville

    DatabaseBackupTable(InputStream is)
    Reads a database backup into a new DatabaseBackupTable instance.

    Constructs a new DatabaseBackupTable for the specified table loading from the provided database connection.

      public DatabaseBackupTable(String tableName, IDB_Connector conn) throws CheckedException
      Constructs a new DatabaseBackupTable for the specified table loading from the provided database connection.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The table to back up.
      conn - The database connection.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A backup error occurs.

    • backup

      public static void backup(String tableName, IDB_Connector conn, OutputStream os) throws CheckedException
      This static method provides the ability to stream the backup.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The table to back up.
      conn - The connection to load from.
      os - The output stream to write to.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A backup error has occurred.

    • restore

      public static void restore(IDB_Connector conn, InputStream is) throws CheckedException
      This static method provides the ability to stream the restore.
      Parameters:
      conn - The connection to store to.
      is - The input stream to read from.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A restore error has occurred.
